org.apache.flex.abc.models

Class FrameModelEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.abc.models.FrameModelEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFlowGraphVisitor

    public class FrameModelEncoder
extends Object
implements IFlowGraphVisitor
    The FrameModelEncoder abstracts ABC instructions into a sequence of operations on the method's "frame" (i.e., its locals, scope stack, and value stack).
